content: very informative do I still think each platform has its reason I don’t think that it would be good to just leave on platform because it easier to use ! people still have myspace.. And Im willing to bet that if you where looking to do business with the relationships that you build more then most of the serious ones will be on the platforms we though would die out Soundcloud is still being use massively but in the world of today id have to say what is the reason ! being that it has no real way to show documentation but then it all makes since when you look at the simplicity of it. its true learning new things can and will be quite frustrating and when one finds out how to run a program, we fall in love with it not allowing out selfs to gain eyes from other major platforms !
